net.neto_framework.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.neto_framework.server.Server

  • public class Server
extends Object
    A server handler that receives and accepts connections using a given protocol.
    Author:
    BleedObsidian (Jesse Prescott)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_BACKLOG
      The default backlog value for TCP servers.
      static Protocol DEFAULT_PROTOCOL
      Default protocol used when a protocol is not given.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Server(PacketManager packetManager)
      New server that is not bound to anything.
      Server(PacketManager packetManager, SocketAddress address)
      New server that binds to given address and uses TCP.
      Server(PacketManager packetManager, SocketAddress address, Protocol protocol)
      New server that binds to given address and uses a given protocol.
      Server(PacketManager packetManager, SocketAddress address, Protocol protocol, int backlog)
      New server that binds to given address and uses a given protocol.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server(PacketManager packetManager,
      SocketAddress address,
      Protocol protocol,
      int backlog)
        New server that binds to given address and uses a given protocol.
        Parameters:
        packetManager - PacketManager.
        address - SocketAddress for server to bind to.
        protocol - Protocol for server to use.
        backlog - Maximum amount of connections to queue for TCP.

      • start

        public void start()
           throws ServerException
        Start accepting and listening for incoming connections.
        Throws:
        ServerException - If fails to start server.

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws ServerException
        Stop accepting and listening for incoming connections.
        Throws:
        ServerException - If fails to stop server.

        public int getBacklog()
        Returns:

      • getTcpSocket

        public ServerSocket getTcpSocket()
        Returns:
        TCP Server Socket. (Null if not using TCP as protocol or if the server has not been started.)

      • getUdpSocket

        public DatagramSocket getUdpSocket()
        Returns:
        UDP Socket. (Null if not using UDP as protocol or if the server has not been started.)

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Returns:
        If server is currently running.
